thread.title: Watch Zac Efron, The Rock escape explosions in official 'Baywatch' trailer
thread.title_full: Watch Zac Efron, The Rock escape explosions in official 'Baywatch' trailer

author: USA TODAY
title: Watch Zac Efron, The Rock escape explosions in official 'Baywatch' trailer
text:
Watch Zac Efron, The Rock escape explosions in official 'Baywatch' trailer Sara M Moniuszko , USA TODAY 12:29 p.m. ET March 22, 2017 54 Shares 
(Photo: Paramount) 
Get ready for swimsuit season -- Baywatch is back. 
The reboot features Dwayne “The Rock” Johnson as devoted lifeguard Mitch Buchannon whose love for his job is just as big as his muscles. Along with a new recruit (played by Zac Efron), the head-butting duo uncover a criminal plot that threatens the Bay’s future. 
Full of toned bodies and beach scenes, the trailer has obvious nods to the original TV series (they couldn’t leave out the slow motion running on the beach or red swimsuits, of course) but also includes explosions, profanity and more edgy remake material. 
The movie also features Priyanka Chopra, Alexandra Daddario and Ilfenesh Hadera. Baywatch icons David Hasselhoff and Pamela Anderson are also set to make an appearance. 
Baywatch hits theaters on May 26. 
Watch the full official trailer below. Read or Share this story: http://usat.ly/2nCgAd9 Most Popular
